learning_steps.text: Model Selection for Your Journal App
learning_steps.action: Model Selection for Your Journal App:
learning_steps.description:
For the capstone project, consider:

• Smaller, faster models for simple sentiment analysis
• Larger models if you need complex reasoning
• Cost per token - some models are 10x more expensive
• Latency requirements - how fast do you need responses?
• Context window - how much text can the model handle?

Explore your cloud AI platform and deploy a model:

1. Compare at least 2 different models in your platform's playground
2. Test different prompts and observe quality, speed, and cost differences
3. Analyze the available deployment options and their trade-offs
4. Decide which model you'll use for your journal application and why
5. Deploy a model that you will utilize for the capstone
